ygData.subject: Re: Stupid
ygData.msgSnippet: its about time somone finally speaks up!!!!  you go girl!!!   im with ya ... From: Buhl, Cliff  To:  Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
its about time somone finally speaks up!!!! you go girl!!! im with ya

----- Original Message -----
From: Buhl, Cliff <cjbuhl@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 9:05 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] Stupid


> From: "Buhl, Cliff" <cjbuhl@...>
>
> What in the hell is the matter with you people?!
>
> Today I got to read about idiot A's Laptop problems (I don't give a f'in
> crap)
>
> Then I got to read 9 comments about idiot B's post about how he is going
to
> sue somebody (I don't give a f'in crap)
>
> REMEBER EQ? The game? Cheats list? Ring a frickin bell?!!! STOP POSTING
> BULLCRAP!!!! IS ANYBODY MONITORING THIS? KICK THESE IDIOTS OFF! I DON'T
> NEED 50 EMAILS ABOUT NOTHING!
>
> Ok sorry had to get it of my cheast and just to show I am not a talking
out
> my arse - here is a bug which if you should want you may exploit (a cheat
> for those of you unfamiliar with the concept.)
>
> At the Entrance to Nanjena you can pull a Rock Dervish. If you get a good
> lead and run around the corner almost zoning into nanjena you can still
cast
> at the Dervish. The mob for some reason climbs the side of the zone and
> never goes into the tunnel to Nanjena. You can then kill the mob without
> getting hit yourself.
>
> The same thing with cyclops in Mt Rathe. You can pull them. Just to the
> North of the entrance from Lk Rathe is a mountain range. If you root or
> snare the cy to slow his movement you can run around the mountain range
and
> cast on him from the other side. The cyclops tries to get to you but
> instead goes way up into the air and never touches you. Flying Cy is
pretty
> funny too.
>
> Anybody else found spots like these? And again the list is about EQ. If
> your message doesn't have GAME INFORMATION OR CHEATS. SHUT THE F UP!
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
